data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Dlussky, G. M., Radchenko, A. G. (1990): [The ants (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) of Vietnam. Subfamily Pseudomyrmicinae. Subfamily Myrmicinae (tribes Calyptomyrmecini, Meranoplini, Cataulacini).]. In: Akimov, I. A., Emelianov, I. G., et al., (Eds): [News of faunistics and systematics.]. Kiev: Naukova Dumka: 119-125, URL: http://hdl.handle.net/10199/
